title: Yandere Hitotsu Yane no Shita
original_name: ヤンデレひとつ屋根の下
sinopse: 1-2. Itareritsukushite! (Service Me Good!) 3. Joushi ga Bitch ni Natta no wa Danjite Ore no Sei ja Nai (It's Not My Fault My Boss Became a Bitch) 4. Bitch no Joushi ga Hageshisugite Komaru (My Bitchy Boss Is Too Relentless, It's Troubling) 5. Kawaikusuru kara Motto Choudai (I'll Be Cute So Give Me More)
